name: Break(It)Out
description:
Break(It)Out is Arkanoid game.

PLAY ON FULL SCREEN! And if need do Ctrl -

To complete the game you have to clean the blocks on scenes on the levels that are coming out. Be careful, if you lose once you have to start over from the beginning, or pause the level when you are close to lose and retry the level if you get frustrated by the tries.

Some blocks have the possibility to drop an upgrade, but it's not always an upgrade, it can be downgrade too. It's your decision to catch them or not. These can be:

- Player Larger

-Player Shorter

-Player Faster

-Player Slower

-Extra Life

-Minus 1 Life

-Change the velocity of the Ball

How far did you get ^^?
